events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product has several scratches and one part seems broken. This is very disappointing.
The issue has been identified as a product defect due to damages reported on the delivered item.
Assigning this case to a product support agent who handles damaged and faulty products.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your product. I’m here to help get this resolved for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please send us some photos of the scratches and the broken part to help us assess the damage properly?
I’ve attached several photos showing the scratches on the surface and the broken hinge. This was exactly why I was hesitant to order.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement item or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would like to receive a replacement as soon as possible. Thank you for the quick response and helpful solution.
We have arranged to send you a replacement immediately. You will receive a confirmation email with tracking details shortly.
Just checking in to ensure your replacement arrived in good condition and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and everything is perfect now. Thanks again for the excellent service.
Closing this case as resolved based on customer confirmation of a satisfactory replacement product.
